plugins.cameraPermission: Allow access to your camera for video recording.
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow access to your microphone for audio recording.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow saving recorded videos to your photo library.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow saving to your photo library.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to record padel matches for analysis.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to microphone to record audio during matches.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to save recorded match videos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app needs permission to save recorded videos to your photo library.
